Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: indicator_charts
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Manuel Warum
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: This widget displays indicator data generated by a remote server. In particular, it displays the state of patients in the area of operations in a bar chart where patients are categorized as healthy (green), injured (orange), critically injured (red), or deceased (black).

InputEndpoint.name: worldstate_in
InputEndpoint.label: Worldstate
InputEndpoint.description: Displays indicators for the specified worldstate
